survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Online Grocery Shopping
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers about their experience with online grocery shopping services, including ease of use, product quality, and delivery satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How often do you use online grocery shopping services?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for this question to ensure clarity.

script.question_text: How often do you use online grocery shopping services?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which of the following online grocery shopping platforms have you used in the past 3 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Occasionally' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox for this question to allow multiple selections.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an 'Other' option with a text field for specification.

script.question_text: Which of the following online grocery shopping platforms have you used in the past 3 months? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Occasionally' in Q1.

questions.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing an online grocery shopping service? (Select up to 3)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Occasionally' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice checkbox with a limit of 3 selections to prioritize factors.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE) with a maximum of 3 selections allowed. Include an 'Other' option with a text field for specification.

script.question_text: What factors are most important to you when choosing an online grocery shopping service? (Select up to 3)
script.routing_logic: This question appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Occasionally' in Q1.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall experience of online grocery shopping?

questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale (single-choice) for this question to measure satisfaction levels.

script.routing_logic: This question appears for respondents who selected 'Daily', 'Weekly', 'Monthly', or 'Occasionally' in Q1.

questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text field to gather qualitative feedback.
